name: Asahi Kanji JLPT-N5 (English)
description: Study tool to memorize Japanese kanji, radicals (bushu) and primitive elements. Various practice drills and a stack of flashcards for the first 120 Jy kanji (2010 official list) and the N5 level (lowest) of the Japanese Language Proficiency Test + 56 radicals (bushu) and primitive elements. Choice of the JLPT or Jy Kanji order. * Ten multiple choice drills on meanings, On-yomi (Chinese readings) and Kun-yomi (Japanese readings), radicals and elements. * Two puzzle and two writing practice drills including stroke order animation. (No ads, no banners as this is a demo version for the Asahi Kanji app.)
